name: Göklerin Liri
desc: Dvalin'in Rüzgar Hükümdarı ile ilişkisini simgeleyen bir büyük yay. Okun yaydan çıkma sesi Rüzgar Hükümdarı için hoş bir şarkı gibidir. Gökyüzünün ve rüzgarın gücünü içinde barındırır.

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Süt Dişi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius' wolf pack is its blessed honor guard, and even the milk teeth of a wolf cub possess great potential.
In the past, the gods had the responsibility to love all people. Andrius was therefore quite unusual in that he became leader of the wolves, while only welcoming abandoned babies and wanderers when it came to humans.

materials.name: Kuru Ley Hattı Dalı
materials.desc: Fragile branches from deep within the earth. Even after years of aging, from beneath it's mottled surface you can see that its power is not yet entirely lost.

materials.name: Sağlam Ok Başı
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Çatlak Dişi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The life of a wolf is not without violence; broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

materials.name: Kuru Ley Hattı Dalı
materials.desc: Fragile branches from deep within the earth. Even after years of aging, from beneath it's mottled surface you can see that its power is not yet entirely lost.

materials.name: Sağlam Ok Başı
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Çatlak Dişi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The life of a wolf is not without violence; broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

materials.name: Kuru Ley Hattı Yaprakları
materials.desc: A twig from deep within the earth. Though it is far from where it once lay, its leaves still pulsate with energy.

materials.name: Sivri Ok Başı
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Kırık Dişi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. The honorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.
In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two great humans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal - that word meaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.

materials.name: Kuru Ley Hattı Yaprakları
materials.desc: A twig from deep within the earth. Though it is far from where it once lay, its leaves still pulsate with energy.

materials.name: Sivri Ok Başı

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Kırık Dişi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. The honorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.
In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two great humans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal - that word meaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.

materials.name: Ley Hattı Filizi
materials.desc: It is said that there was a great tree whose roots once spread out to every corner of the world, and this branch is said to be part of it. It is almost if it was never broken off and taken far away, for its vitality is such that it still sprouts new leaves even now.

materials.name: Eski Ok Başı
materials.desc:
An old arrowhead coated in blood. The arrowhead has long since lost its sharpness and thus its use as a weapon.
However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Özlemi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The Wolf King, believing himself to despise humans, thought himself unable to envision a happy life for humanity, making him unworthy of becoming the Lord of the Winds of the world. Therefore, he chose to disappear. Yet, in truth, he gazes on the ones abandoned by the world ever so gently.

materials.name: Ley Hattı Filizi
materials.desc: It is said that there was a great tree whose roots once spread out to every corner of the world, and this branch is said to be part of it. It is almost if it was never broken off and taken far away, for its vitality is such that it still sprouts new leaves even now.

However, it represents the pride of a hunter and acts as both an amulet and a medal.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Genel para birimi. Herkesin anladığı dil.

desc.text:
Gök delen lir.
Bu lirden çalınan duru ezgiler, halen insanların yüreğinde ve rüzgarlarda yankılanır.
Lirden çıkan melodilerin, hiçlikten gelen kadim ve kötü ejderhanın aklını çeldiği söylenir.
Eski zamanlarda, Barbatos lirini usulca tıngırdatır ve binlerce saf rüzgarı çağırırdı.
Ulu ejderha Dvalin, özgür ruhlu rüzgarlar ve şarkılar karşısında büyülenmiş ve alçalarak Barbatos'a bağlılık yemini etmiş.
Barbatos yeni bir dost edindiği için çok mutlu olmuş ve Mondstadt halkını Dvalin'e emanet etmiş.
Böylece etrafta gezen Rüzgar Hükümdarı ile Rüzgar Ejderi, Mondstadt'ın şafağını dostluklarıyla sökmüş.
Lirin akıcı ezgileri, gölge ejderhanın son savaştaki saldırısını durdurmuş...
Dvalin de gölge ejderhanın kötü saltanatına son verme fırsatını elde etmiş.
Rüzgarlar şarkı söyledikten ve amansız savaş bittikten asırlar sonra, Dvalin derin uykusundan uyanmış.
Ama efendisi artık yokmuş, kendisini Hiçlik Tarikatının fesat fısıltıları karşılamış.
Görülmemiş bir acı. Duyulmamış bir eziyet.
Her şeyi yutan bu ızdırap, zehirlenmiş Dvalin'in ruhunu parçalamış.
Dvalin, korumaya yemin ettiği şeye düşman olmuş,
bağlılık yemini ettiği kişiyi suçlamış:
"Acım Barbatos'un umurunda değil! Ne umursamaz bir dosttur o!"
"Hükümdarların en zalimi Barbatos'a lanet olsun!"
Öfkeli dost, Barbatos'un kendisini kurtarmaya çalıştığını bilmiyormuş.
Çünkü beraber geçirdikleri onca güzel zaman, Dvalin'in ızdırabıyla tarihe karışmıştı. Barbatos'un liri hariç, yani Göklerin Kutsal Liri.
Yüzyıllardır süren yanlış anlaşılma yakında son bulacak.
Dvalin, dostunun şarkılarını yakında bir kez daha duyacak.

value.text: Kritik Hasarı <color=#37ffff>20%/25%/30%/35%/40%</color> artırır. Vuruşlar <color=#37ffff>60%/70%/80%/90%/100%</color> ihtimalle küçük bir alanda etkili saldırıya dönüşerek 125% Fiziksel Saldırı kadar Hasar verir. <color=#37ffff>4/3.5/3/2.5/2</color> saniyede bir uygulanabilir.

value.name: Göklerin Liri
value.desc:
Yankılanan Balat

Bu gökleri delip geçen lirin sesi, Rüzgar Hükümdarı'nın kulağına müzik gibi gelir.
